Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problem on the train at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problem on the train at Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
